description.translate: Follow the day, follow past dreams, because nothing is impossible for you.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Alsham\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Suis le jour, suis les rêves passés,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7car rien n'est impossible pour toi.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Follow the day, follow past dreams,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7because nothing is impossible for you.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HAS§a5 §7SPD§a3\"}"]}}
